meanings.definition: Objects made of wood, especially for household use.
meanings.sent1: I bought some new woodenware for my kitchen.
meanings.sent2: The store sells a variety of woodenware like cutting boards and utensils.
meanings.sent3: The woodenware in the kitchen seemed to have a mind of its own, always rearranging itself.
meanings.sent4: Her collection of woodenware was a forest of practicality in her home.
meanings.sent5: The woodenware gleamed in the sunlight, showcasing its natural beauty.

meanings.definition: The craft or business of making wooden objects.
meanings.sent1: His family has been in the woodenware business for generations.
meanings.sent2: Learning the art of woodenware requires patience and skill.
meanings.sent3: The woodenware crafters had a competition to see who could carve the tiniest figurine.
meanings.sent4: In the world of woodenware, he was a master sculptor, shaping intricate designs.
meanings.sent5: The woodenware industry boomed as people rediscovered the beauty of handmade items.
